review: My father in law age 81 had repeated blackouts.  Consulted Dr Sanjai at SIMS hospital. With ECG report he clearly explained that because of slow heart rate he had blackouts.  He performed Dual chamber pace maker surgery.  Considering age and other comorbidities, he patiently  did procedure.  My father in law was able to walk from 2nd day onwards and fully recovered. Now he is able to walk confidentially 3 times a day. All thanks to Dr Sanjai.

I had been with my wife for consultation with Dr. Sanjay cordioligist at SIMS Vadapalani last week. The doctor was very kind in words and action with his smiling face. He never used a word of threatening the patient instead cordially advised what to do . His hopeful words and creating confidence to patient is much appreciated.  I shall recommend my friends and relatives to Dr.Sanjay  if they have a need for heart problems Thanks to him once again  Venkataramani  Age 75 Saligramam
